item.title: Pandas (Python)
item.description: Pandas is a software module for the Python programming language for the purpose of data manipulation and analysis. It provides data structures and operations to manipulate numerical tables and time series data. It is build on top of numpy. It is applied for fast analysis and data cleaning and preparation
